description.value:
You receive a +4 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense against bull rush, drag, grapple, reposition, and trip attempts. A creature trying to confirm a critical hit against you has a â€“4 penalty on its confirmation roll.

At 5th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge} as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisite to gain this feat.
